Dbug Class Referenceabstract

Debug Class. More...

#include <Dbug.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for Dbug:
Collaboration diagram for Dbug:

Detailed Description

This is an abstract peripheral character class that can be used for debugging. For an example see: DbugUart

enum Dbug::mode
Enumerator

OCTAL

hexadecimal
